深蹲

开头

说起健身 Speaking of fitness
深蹲总是是一个绕不开的动作 Squats are always an unavoidable movement
无论是在家锻炼身体 Whether it's exercising at home
还是去健身房撸铁增肌 Or go to the gym to build muscle
haishi'qu'jianshenfang'lu'tie'zeng'ji
深蹲动作都是一个必选项 Squats are a must
但据我观察 But according to my observation
能够真正对深蹲的人 people who can really squat
似乎并不多 doesn't seem like much
特别是健身新手 Especially for beginners
有很多蹲法 there are many squats
可能不会让你一下子受伤 probably won't hurt you all at once
但长年累月下来 But over the years
关节和肌肉的劳损风险 Joint and muscle strain risk
guanjie'he'jirou'de'laosun'fengxian
也是非常让人头疼的 also very headache
为了避免受伤 to avoid injury
wei'le'bimian'shoushang
炼出更好的效果 make better results

这里是瘦子增重的百科全书 Here's the Encyclopedia of Thin People Gaining Weight

新手做深蹲 beginners doing squats
最常见的有着两种姿势 There are two most common postures

两种姿势

一种蹲法是 a squat is
上半身站的比较直 The upper body stands relatively straight
膝盖主动大幅度往前冲 Knee actively and sharply forward
xigai'zhudong'da'fudu'wang'qian'chong
脚跟好像还有点抬起来 The heels seem to be lifted up a bit
大家现在就可以对着镜子 Everyone can look in the mirror now
原地蹲两个看看 Squat in place and take a look
是这种蹲法的同学 It's a classmate who squats like this
来弹幕举个手 Come to the barrage and raise your hand
lai'dan'mu'ju'ge'shou
另一种蹲法是 Another way to squat is
上半身前倾的厉害 The upper body is leaning forward
shangbanshen'qian'qing'de'lihai
有种屁股往后找凳子坐的感觉 There is a feeling of looking for a stool with the buttocks backward
you'zhong'pigu'wang'hou'zhao'dengzi'zuo'de'ganjue
就像武术里的扎马步一样 Just like the zama step in martial arts
jiu'xiang'wushu'li'de'zha'ma'bu'yiyang
是这种蹲法的同学 It's a classmate who squats like this
也来弹幕举个手 Raise your hand too
这两种蹲法有什么区别呢？ What is the difference between these two squats?
使用左边蹲法的同学 Students who use the left squat method
下蹲的瞬间 moment of squatting
xia'dun'de'shunjian
第一个想到的 first thought
应该是把膝盖弯曲蹲下去 You should bend your knees and squat down
yinggai'shi'ba'xigai'wanqu'dun'xiaqu
所以这种蹲法 So this squat
是由屈膝主导的动作 action dominated by knee flexion
shi'you'quxi'zhudao'de'dongzuo
而控制膝盖稳定的肌肉并不多 And there are not many muscles that control the stability of the knee
相对比较薄弱 relatively weak
xiangdui'bijiao'boruo
所以这么蹲 so squat
膝关节的压力会很大 There will be a lot of pressure on the knee
很容易受伤 easily hurt
而是用右边蹲法的同学 But the students who squat on the right
想的应该是 think should be
我要往后坐下去 I'm going to sit back
所以这种蹲法 So this squat
是由屈髋主导的动作 action dominated by hip flexion
虽然膝关节也大幅度弯曲了 Although the knee joint is also greatly bent
但不是主动弯曲 but not active bending
而是被动弯曲的 passive bending
所以落在膝盖上的压力 so the pressure on the knees
也没有那么多 not so much
显然，右边的屈髋蹲法更正确 Obviously, the right hip flexion squat is more correct
xianran, youbian'de'qu'kuan'dun'fa'geng'zhengque
更适合我们普通人使用 It is more suitable for us ordinary people to use
也更安全 also safer
屈髋蹲法虽然看起来也不难 Although the hip-bending squat method looks not difficult
但很多人总是找不到动作要领 But many people can't find the essentials of action
这里给大家总结了三个要点 Here are three main points
跟着做马上就能够学会 Just follow it and you'll learn it right away

充分屈髋

第一点：学会充分屈髋 The first point: learn to fully flex your hips
身体动作是由我们的意识控制的 Body movements are controlled by our consciousness
如果你在深蹲的时候 if you squat
想的是让身体往下蹲 The idea is to let the body squat down
诶，这就有问题了 eh, here's the problem
很大概率你会做成屈膝蹲 There's a good chance you'll do a knee squat
你应该做的是 what you should do is
下顿的时候想着 Think about it when you pause
把臀部往后移 move the hips back
ba'tunbu'wang'hou'yi
这才是屈髋蹲法的正确启动方式 This is the correct way to start the hip flexion squat
zhe'cai'shi'qu'kuan'dun'fa'de'zhengque'qidong'fangshi
没经验的同学 inexperienced students
可以通过这样的方式来练习屈髋 You can practice hip flexion in this way
先靠墙站好 stand against the wall first
xian'kao'qiang'zhan'hao
然后往前走一小步 then take a small step forward
然后拿个小矮凳 then take a small stool
顶住你的小腿 hold your calf
ding'zhu'ni'de'xiaotui
在不移动凳子的情况下 without moving the stool
用你的屁股去找墙 use your ass to find the wall
尽量碰到墙面为止 until it touches the wall
jinliang'peng'dao'qiang'mian'weizhi
整个过程中 throughout the process
只是在控制臀部前后水平移动 Just move horizontally back and forth while controlling the hips
并没有上下蹲起 did not squat up and down
这个动作就是我们常说的 This action is what we often say
屈髋绞链 hip flexion chain
qu'kuan'jiao'lian
做熟练之后 After being proficient
可以把凳子拿掉离开墙面 The stool can be removed off the wall
无辅助的做这个动作 Do this unassisted
wu'fuzhu'de'zuo'zhege'dongzuo
能够轻松完成的话 if it can be done easily
你就已经学会怎么屈髋了 You've learned how to bend your hips
对新手来说 for beginners
可能会有这两个难点 There may be two difficulties
第一个是 the first is
有的人总是想着身体要保持直立 Some people always think about keeping their bodies upright
不敢往前俯身 dare not lean forward
bu'gan'wang'qian'fu'shen
所以会出现撅起屁股找墙的情况 So there will be a situation where you stick your ass up and look for the wall
suoyi'hui'chuxian'jue'qi'pigu'zhao'qiang'de'qingkuang
虽然这样做很诱人 Although it is tempting to do so
suiran'zheyang'zuo'hen'you'ren
但你的腰会疼 but your back hurts
第二个是 the second is
有的人直接就整个上半身 Some people directly apply the whole upper body
弯腰往下拱 bend down arch
虽然屁股也贴到墙面了 Although the ass is also stuck to the wall
suiran'pigu'ye'tie'dao'qiang'mianle
但是这里是弓着的 but here it is bowed
danshi'zheli'shi'gongzhe'de
这样腰部会很累 so the waist will be very tired
刚刚出现这两种错误的同学 Students who just made these two mistakes
可以来弹幕举个手 You can come to the barrage and raise your hand
怎么解决这两个问题呢 How to solve these two problems
我们来看第二点 Let's look at the second point

脊柱中立

脊柱中立 neutral spine
jizhu'zhongli
上半身要保持全程直立 Keep your upper body upright all the way
就要把脊柱始终控制在中立位上 Keep your spine in a neutral position
我们仔细观察发现 We observed carefully
脊柱容易控制不住的地方 The place where the spine is easy to lose control
基本都是在腰椎段 Basically in the lumbar segment
jiben'dou'shi'zai'yaochui'duan
弯腰的时候 when bending over
腰椎前屈 lumbar flexion
撅腚的时候 when pouting
jue'ding'de'shihou
腰椎后审 lumbar post-examination
所以控制好腰椎 So control your lumbar spine
记住中立的问题 remember neutral questions
就基本解决了 basically solved
那怎么控制 how to control
腰椎这块的肌肉 The muscles of the lumbar spine
就是平时常说的 that's what i usually say
核心肌群 The core muscles
hexin'ji'qun
收紧核心肌群 tighten core muscles
就能够控制好腰椎的稳定 Can control the stability of the lumbar spine
先用腹式呼吸 belly breathing first
xian'yong'fu'shi'huxi
吸一口气到肚子里 take a breath into the stomach
然后暂时用力憋住 Then hold back for a while
ranhou'zhanshi'yongli'bie'zhu
用力让腰腹四周的腹肌肌群 Force the abdominal muscles around the waist and abdomen
往里收 close in
收到什么程度 to what extent
用拳头打不进去的程度就够了 It's enough that you can't get in with your fist
yong'quantou'da'bu'jinqu'de'chengdu'jiu'goule
除了腹肌肌群 Except for the abdominal muscles
我们还需要收紧下方盆底肌 We also need to tighten the lower pelvic floor muscles
women'hai'xuyao'shou'jin'xiafang'pen'di'ji
这个很简单 this is very simple
找到主动憋尿的感觉就对了 It's right to find the feeling of actively holding back urine
zhaodao'zhudong'bie'niao'de'ganjue'jiu'duile
这个大家应该挺熟练的 Everyone should be quite familiar with this
维持在这个状态下 stay in this state
weichi'zai'zhege'zhuangtai'xia
腰部是很难弯曲 the waist is hard to bend
或者反弓的 or anti-bow
huozhe'fan'gong'de
这个时候进行屈髋绞链 hip flexion chain
就很容易保持脊柱中立 It's easy to keep your spine neutral
但是总不能一直憋着气不放吧？ But you can't hold your breath all the time, can you?
我们可以尝试在收紧核心的情况下 We can try to tighten the core
进行较浅的呼吸 take shallow breaths
jinxing'jiao'qian'de'huxi
继续练习屈髋绞链 Continue to practice the hip hinge chain

就得像脚链一样 like an anklet
一髋关节为轴心 One hip joint as the axis
yi'kuan'guanjie'wei'zhou'xin
上下半身进行折叠 Fold the upper and lower body
shang'xiabanshen'jinxing'zhedie
无论是上半身还是下半身 Both the upper body and the lower body
都必须像铁片一样 must be like iron
必须是直的 must be straight
不能弯 Can't bend
这样你的腰部 so your waist

双膝外展

双膝外展 knee abduction
我们来重新理顺一下步骤 Let's reorder the steps
women'lai'chongxin'li'shun'yixia'buzhou
双脚先以 feet first
比肩略宽的站距站好 It is better to stand at a distance slightly wider than the shoulders
bijian'lue'kuan'de'zhan'ju'zhan'hao
首先用力收紧核心肌群 Tighten your core muscles first
腹肌打不进去 Abs can't get in
同时找到憋尿的感觉 At the same time find the feeling of holding back urine
然后臀部水平往后推 Then push your hips back horizontally
上半身大胆地往前俯身 The upper body boldly leans forward
进行一个充分的屈髋 perform a full hip flexion
最后膝盖大幅度地往两边展开 Finally, the knees are widely spread to the sides
诶，是不是自然而然地？ Eh, is it natural?

应该是同时进行移动的 should be moving at the same time

这么髋膝联动 Such a hip-knee linkage

大腿比例长

这种蹲法其实会有个小问题 This squatting method actually has a small problem
就是，如果你的大腿比例比较长 That is, if your thigh ratio is relatively long
很容易会出现蹲一半 It is easy to squat in half
不太顺畅的情况 not so smooth situation
感觉重心有点往前倒 I feel like my center of gravity is falling forward a bit.
特别是如果打着杠铃蹲 especially if barbell squats
tebie'shi'ruguo'dazhe'gangling'dun
腰部的压力会明显增大 The pressure on the waist will increase significantly
如果出现了这种情况 if this happens
就让你的膝盖 just let your knees
适当地往脚尖的方向 Properly to the direction of the toes
shidang'de'wang'jiaojian'de'fangxiang
前滑一点出去 slide forward to get out
qian'hua'yidian'chuqu
马上就能够蹲的很顺畅了 Immediately, I can squat smoothly.
有人可能会问 one might ask
这样蹲 squat like this
膝盖不就超过脚尖了吗？ Doesn't the knee exceed the toe?
其实正确的深蹲 In fact, the correct squat
膝盖是可以 knee is ok
甚至是建议 even a suggestion
最好超过脚尖的 preferably over the toes
只要重心能保持在足弓中心 As long as the center of gravity can be kept in the center of the arch
膝盖超不超过脚尖 Knees no higher than toes
都没问题 no problem

踝关节受限

肯定有部分同学 Certainly some students
跟着这集的方法 Follow the method of this episode
还是怎么蹲 how to squat
也蹲下不去 I can't squat down
蹲到一半就卡住了 Stuck half way down
dun'dao'yiban'jiu'ka'zhule
再往下蹲 squat down
就走形了 out of shape
这种情况呢 What about this situation?
一般就是受到两个关节的限制 Generally limited by two joints
yiban'jiushi'shoudao'liang'ge'guanjie'de'xianzhi
踝关节受限和髋关节受限 Ankle Restriction and Hip Restriction
huai'guanjie'shou'xian'he'kuan'guanjie'shou'xian
踝关节受限 restricted ankle
也叫足背区受限 also called dorsum region limitation
就是你脚踝这里 this is your ankle
勾脚尖 Hook toes
gou'jiaojian
勾不起来 Can't hook up
如果你患有扁平足的话 if you have flat feet
ruguo'ni'huan'you'bianpingzu'dehua
那么大概率就会出现这种情况 Then there is a high probability that this will happen
我们深蹲 we squat
蹲到低的时候 when squatting low
脚踝这里肯定是要折叠起来的 The ankle must be folded here
如果你的足背区首先 If your instep area is first
折叠不起来 can't fold
还硬要往下蹲 I still have to squat down
那会发生什么呢？ So what happens?
脚跟也会跟着翘起来嘛 Will the heels be raised too?
jiaogen'ye'hui'genzhe'qiao'qilai'ma
要不也很容易弯下去 Otherwise it is easy to bend
这样就很危险了 it's dangerous
那怎么办 what to do
这里我也没办法 I can't do anything here
马上治好你的扁平足 Fix your flat feet now
mashang'zhi'hao'ni'de'bianpingzu
最简单的方法就是 The easiest way to do this is
找两个小杆铃片 Find two small barbells
垫在脚后跟做深蹲 Heel pads for squats
dian'zai'jiaohougen'zuo'shen'dun
减少脚踝折叠的幅度 Reduces ankle fold
这样蹲起来就很顺畅了 It's easier to squat like this

髋关节受限

而髋关节受限原因就很多了 There are many reasons for hip limitation
可能是骨骼结构不一样 Possibly a different bone structure
keneng'shi'guge'jiegou'bu'yiyang
可能是大腿后侧筋膜太紧张 Possibly the posterior thigh fascia is too tight
keneng'shi'datui'hou'ce'jin'mo'tai'jinzhang
都很导致你很难完成充分的屈髋 make it difficult for you to achieve full hip flexion
蹲一半就蹲不下去了 I can't squat halfway down.
再蹲就要变成 squatting again will become
屈膝主导的蹲法了 Knee dominant squat
那这个怎么办 what about this
也很简单 also very simple
站距站宽一点 Stand wider
膝盖往两边打开的幅度 How far the knees open to the sides
再大一些 bigger
通常就能够马上蹲下去了 Usually you can squat down right away.
平时练完多拉伸 Stretch often after practice
pingshi'lian'wan'duo'la'shen
